/** [Question_SQL.xml][com.project.goTravel.question.service.impl.QuestionMapper.selectQuestionListServiceList"][문의글 리스트 조회][김지은]*/
SELECT * FROM (SELECT FORMAT(@ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1, 0) AS 'NUM' , QUEST_MNG_NO , QUEST_SUBJ , QUEST_CAT_CD , QUEST_CAT , MBR_NM , REG_DE FROM T_QUEST_MNG ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) RNUM WHERE DP_YN = 'Y') B ORDER BY B.QUEST_MNG_NO desc LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
/** [Question_SQL.xml][com.project.goTravel.question.service.impl.QuestionMapper.countQuestionListTotal"][문의글 총 개수 조회][김지은]*/ SELECT COUNT(QUEST_MNG_NO) AS 'TOTCAT' FROM T_QUEST_MNG WHERE DP_YN = 'Y'
